name: Today'sCatholicCalendarbyDivineOfficeorg
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Learn more about Today in the Catholic Calendar, created by DivineOffice.org. This skill will automatically play About Today's contents from the DivineOffice.org podcast. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day.

Divine Office mission is to evangelize and to nurture our Catholic relationship with God by designing and offering contents, software products, development and design services for the Catholic community.

Divine Office is produced by our non-profit ministry with the purpose of promoting the tradition of praying always through these ancient treasures of the Church, not only to Catholics but to all Christians universally.

The Liturgy of the Hours produced by this ministry is recognized as the best Catholic podcast, website and mobile app (About.com Readers’ Choice Awards 2011 and 2012) and has been approved for use by the International Committee for English in the Liturgy (ICEL) and the United States Conference of Catholic Bishops (USCCB).

The English translation of The Liturgy of the Hours (Four Volumes) ©1974, International Commission on English in the Liturgy Corporation. Readings and Old and New Testament Canticles (except the Gospel Canticles) are from the New American Bible © 1970 Confraternity of Christian Doctrine, Washington, D.C.. Used with permission. All rights reserved. The DivineOffice.org website, podcast, apps and all related media follows the liturgical calendar for the United States. The 1970 edition of the New American Bible as published in the Liturgy of the Hours is approved for use only in the United States. DivineOffice.org website, podcast, apps and all related media is © 2006-2022 Surgeworks, Inc. All rights reserved.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
